name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Christmas Anime Girl: Festive Charm in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Celebrate the festive season with a charming Christmas anime girl theme and easy shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Celebrate the holiday season with a charming Christmas Anime Girl theme featuring vibrant visuals.

Minimalist Design: A clean and festive interface that captures the magic of Christmas with an anime twist.
Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date at a glance during the festive season.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate instantly to your favorite websites with ease.
Play Games: Access entertaining games directly from your shortcuts for added holiday fun.
Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
More Extension: Add seasonal features to enhance your browsing experience with festive cheer.
